item.title: STDS Reflection - Scraping the Australian Energy Market Operator 'Energy Demand' Data
item.description: In this post we will examine how to download all of the data energy demand data available from the Australian Energy Market Operator by using their aemo package in R. This data is displayed via a graphic on their page, however the graphic only allows for a specific timeframe of 5 days to be viewed at a time, and only one state at a time too. Thankfully the aemo package will let us download all of it!

item.description: Interactive Maps in R with leaflet 2018-07-24 Plotting interactive maps is easy with the leaflet package in R.
